PROJECT1.TITLE: AI Intelligent Supply Chain System
PROJECT1.DESC: AI-powered backend for manufacturing, increasing shipping efficiency by 30%.

PROJECT2.TITLE: Digital Transformation Dashboard
PROJECT2.DESC: Automating Excel workflows to visualize operational data in real-time.

PROJECT3.TITLE: Liberal Arts to Tech Success
PROJECT3.DESC: Student Story: From zero base to landing a frontend engineer role at a top e-commerce firm.

PROJECT4.TITLE: Quant Trading & WEB3 Integration
PROJECT4.DESC: From on-chain monitoring to automated exchange execution for high-frequency trading.

HEADER.SUBTITLE: Digital Solution Navigator
HEADER.TITLE:
There are many paths to digital,
which one fits your current stage?
HEADER.DESC: Before investing budget, we want you to understand the market options. There is no best tool, only the strategy that best fits your current needs.

DIY.TITLE: No-Code Platforms
DIY.SCENARIO: Validating Business Ideas (MVP), Personal Portfolios, Standard E-commerce.
DIY.COST: Functionality limited by platform, data hard to migrate. You act as Designer & PM.
DIY.ADVICE: Expert Advice: A great start! If budget is tight and time allows, try Wix first. Come to us for a system upgrade when business logic gets complex.

AI.TITLE: AI Assisted Generation
AI.SCENARIO: Rapid Prototyping, One-off Internal Tools, Single Function Scripts.
AI.COST: Generated code lacks architectural structure. Hard to debug as system grows, plus security concerns.
AI.ADVICE: Expert Advice: AI is a great accelerator! We use it too. But you need a senior architect to review AI code to ensure the system won't crash under load.

ENT.TITLE: Professional Architecture
ENT.SCENARIO: Core Business Systems, High Concurrency Platforms, Long-term Digital Assets.

PROCESS.TITLE: When templates fail and AI can't solve logic...
PROCESS.DESC:
This is where we step in. We don't just provide code, we provide a battle-tested system craftsmanship.
Here is the standard Tiger Digital process:

STEP1.TITLE: Business Logic & Blueprint Design
STEP1.SUBTITLE: Blueprint & Architecture
STEP1.DESC: Most projects fail from "building without thinking". We introduce DDD (Domain-Driven Design) to break complex business into clear data models and user journeys.

STEP2.TITLE: Modern Core Development
STEP2.SUBTITLE: Modern Engineering
STEP2.DESC: Reject spaghetti code. Adopting Angular + Go strong typing architecture combined with AI Copilot. This means bank-grade stability with startup speed.

STEP3.TITLE: AI Automation & Workflow
STEP3.SUBTITLE: AI-Powered Workflow
STEP3.DESC: Go-live is just the start. We integrate n8n and LLM to turn your system into a "thinking" automation hub.

CTA.TITLE: Ready to upgrade your Business Engine?
CTA.DESC: Don't let old processes drag you down. Spend 1 minute to fill out requirements for a free architecture assessment.
CTA.NOTE: * Current Schedule: Consultations available starting next week

CARD1.TITLE: Digital Transformation
CARD1.DESC: Say goodbye to Excel chaos. Tailor-made internal systems to automate tedious processes.

CARD2.TITLE: Web Application Development
CARD2.DESC: Building high-security, high-concurrency enterprise applications. Ensuring stability and scalability.

CARD3.TITLE: Tech Consulting & Mentoring
CARD3.DESC: Passing down battle-tested experience from non-CS to senior. Grounded career advice and technical guidance.

FOOTER.SLOGAN:
Digital Simplicity. Business Agility.
Building strong digital moats for enterprises,
Guiding clear career paths for engineers.
